response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its exceptional features and the time, effort, and resources invested into its creation, we believe it's worth significantly more than its actual cost. Considering the value it offers, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at an introductory price of $15,000. We understand that the true value of the product may be subjective and varies from person to person. Therefore, if this offer aligns with your expectations and budget, we would be delighted to facilitate the transaction. Should you require additional information or have any questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you and providing you with a product that will exceed your expectations.", "product_price": 15000}
